Html: In my TypeScript project, I want all of my compiled JavaScript files to go into a build folder and not be placed alongside their TypeScript source file. I know this is trivial with the command line compiler, but is this possible with the Visual Studio plugin?

I have the same problem!
Someone can help us?

i found a solution:
Edit your project file and search for <TypeScriptOutFile> tag.
the prepend this string before the file name: $(OutputPath)/
Now you can use the project output path to place the Js file in the correct directory
